sourcesContent:
// src/components/Sidebar.js import React from "react"; // Path to default fallback if school has no logo import athletiqLogo from "../assets/logo.png"; export default function Sidebar({ school, user, athletiqLogo: customAthletiqLogo }) { // Choose ATHLETIQ logo (from prop or default) const athletiqLogoSrc = customAthletiqLogo || athletiqLogo; // School logo fallback const schoolLogoSrc = school?.logo_url ? `${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || "http://localhost:5000"}/uploads/${school.logo_url}` : "https://ui-avatars.com/api/?name=" + encodeURIComponent(school?.name || "School"); return (
{/* ATHLETIQ Logo */}
ATHLETIQ
{/* School Info */} {school && (
{school.name}
Code: {school.school_code || school.id}
)} {/* Navigation (add icons later if needed) */}
  • Dashboard
    • {/* Placeholder for other nav links */}
  • Players
  • Teams (soon)
  • Tournaments (soon)
{/* Footer user info / logout */}
Logged in as: {user.full_name || user.email}
{user.role}
); }
